channel.title: REcruiting GFX specialist for the most fulfilling job he'll ever have!
channel.description: Would you like to be a part of the story? would you like to be involved in the best up in upcoming runescape private server that models 2006? would you like to be a possible mod for our server in exchange for gfx work? If you are interested in this amazing opportunity add me on skype : alpha.scape

item.title: REcruiting GFX specialist for the most fulfilling job he'll ever have!
item.dc:creator: @Host_Gushers Host Gushers
item.description:
@Host_Gushers wrote:

[quote=“nickypie, post:6, topic:478263”][quote author=Host Gushers link=topic=596461.msg4207708#msg4207708 date=1359160490]

me plz

I thought u said u cant do gfx anymore cause u broke your hand…?
[/quote]

I thought you had some common sense.[/quote]
I will be the adult here and back off. Cant you take a joke? ? ? ? ? ? ? ^.^

Read full topic

item.description:
@deraseum44 wrote:

I am up for this challenge, I have a full portfolio/references pm me if you are interested. I have been looking into getting back into the community as a designer, the last one I was a designer for was OBPK.
